about.name: F2LB First 2 Lifetime Block community
about.description_short: We starting to get together to make a coordinated effort to help new pools with 0 blocks in getting started.
about.description_long: Starting from a post on the official Cardano forums, a few of us are starting to get together to make a coordinated effort to help new pools with 0 blocks in getting started. The general idea is that we would stake any available ADA to one pool, using a rotating queue system, until that pool gets one or two blocks, then we would all move our stake to the next pool in the queue.
